302.text: Sophie: Sorry, Neil! It was b) Gattaca.

306.text: This 1997 sci-fi film centres on the character Vincent Freeman,

311.text: who wasn't genetically engineered, but is able to buy the genetic identity of another man

318.text: in order to pursue his dream of travelling into space.

322.text: The film's title uses the letters G, A, T and C, which are the four chemical codes making up DNA.
